text: Hi..I am fully aware that the main functionality of the chat widget is to have it pop-up on your website or HubSpot pages, I'd actually like to make a page where the chat is embedded as part of the actual page body. How we can achieve this?

Hey Guys,

Not sure if this is the right channel - but I’m trying to find a way to automatically convert a form submission into a pdf that is attached to a company.

My brain automatically went to a WF that send and internal email with all the properties on the form submission. with a bot that downloads the email and attaches it to the company record.

I know…. seems wildly convoluted there must be an easier way!!

Does anyone have any idea?
Hey <@U020CTDRH4Z> You’ll want to use the `inlineEmbedSelector` documented <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/chat-widget-sdk|here> to achieve this
